TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed DataGridViewSelectionMode extends System.Enum

summary.span: Describe cómo se pueden seleccionar celdas de un control DataGridView.

span.span: Describes how cells of a DataGridView control can be selected.

remarks.format: ## Remarks Esta enumeración se usa para establecer el propiedad de un control.This enumeration is used to set the property of a control. ## Examples En el ejemplo de código siguiente se muestra el uso de este tipo.The following code example illustrates the use of this type. Para obtener más información, consulte [Cómo: establecer el modo de selección del DataGridView Control de formularios Windows Forms](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md).For more information, see [How to: Set the Selection Mode of the Windows Forms DataGridView Control](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-set-the-selection-mode-of-the-windows-forms-datagridview-control.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#065](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/CS/datagridviewmisc.cs#065)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc#065](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewMisc/VB/datagridviewmisc.vb#065)]

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode CellSelect = int32(0)

summary.span: Se pueden seleccionar una o más celdas concretas.

span.span: One or more individual cells can be selected.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode ColumnHeaderSelect = int32(4)

summary.span: La columna se seleccionará haciendo clic en la celda de encabezado de la columna.

span.span: The column will be selected by clicking in the column's header cell.

summary.span: Se pueden seleccionar celdas concretas haciendo clic en esas celdas.

span.span: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode FullColumnSelect = int32(2)

summary.span: Se seleccionará toda la columna haciendo clic en el encabezado de la columna o en una celda contenida en esa columna.

span.span: The entire column will be selected by clicking the column's header or a cell contained in that column.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode FullRowSelect = int32(1)

summary.span: Se seleccionará toda la fila haciendo clic en el encabezado de fila o en una celda contenida en esa fila.

span.span: The entire row will be selected by clicking its row's header or a cell contained in that row.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype System.Windows.Forms.DataGridViewSelectionMode RowHeaderSelect = int32(3)

summary.span: La fila se seleccionará haciendo clic en la celda de encabezado de la fila.

span.span: The row will be selected by clicking in the row's header cell.

summary.span: Se pueden seleccionar celdas concretas haciendo clic en esas celdas.

span.span: An individual cell can be selected by clicking that cell.
